attributes.action: Make Katie Hopkins and Julia Hartley-Brewer part of the Brexit negotiating team.
attributes.additional_details: Julia Hartley-Brewer and Katie Hopkins have campaigned to leave the EU for a decade now and are experts in dealing with the EU and thus should be part of the negotiating team.
attributes.background: Katie Hopkins and Julia Hartley-Brewer are experts on the issue of Brexit and have experience in the world of business. They are also one of the 17.3 million people who voted to leave the EU and thus have the willingness to negotiate Brexit and protect the interest and prosperity of the UK.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. This includes petitions asking for people to be given specific jobs.
